Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.name: Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant Thought)
Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dby1eQ7y5dXBWlyc]{Contagious Idea}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice the spell level.

Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness (Amped).name: Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness (Amped)
Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness (Amped).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.cNnHV97gPqxJ3Rrr]{Glimpse Weakness}

You deal additional precision damage equal to 1d4+1, and then the spell ends.

Amp Heightened (+2) The additional precision damage increases by 1d4+1.

Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis (Amped).name: Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis (Amped)
Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis (Amped).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dhpXpzt7TCm8TbHM]{Thermal Stasis}

The target gains resistance 2 against fire damage and resistance 2 against cold damage.

Heightened (+1) Each resistance increases by 2.
